name: Eighth Notch
description:
There is a legend that says a train to those who are desperate for an escape from their old lives, no matter who they are. Businessmen at the top of their game and those lost in the bottles at the bars alike have all gone to the old train yard, and not returned.

Eighth Notch is a hack between Fari RPG's Firelights and Breathless SRDs. You are a runaway on the train to nowhere.
Though not everything is what it seems....
The other passengers are like you, running from something they deem worth escaping but trapped on this train that has only two ways out, solve your way to the front and hit the brakes, or death. 

We recommend the Script Change and the consent checklist by Gehenna Gaming, but you are free to use ones that work for you

Purchase Includes:

  • 1 trifold brochure 
  • Character Creation
  • A Breakdown of how to play
  • At least 4 different ways to play

You will need:

  • 4 - 5 players
  • A full set of Game Dice
  • A Deck of Cards
  • Index Cards for Character creation
  • Playtime of 2 - 5 hours
